name: Prime Backpack
description:
A backpack with shock-absorbing shoulder straps.Be prepared for every workout, every class or every work day. This extra-large adidas backpack brings order to chaos with a padded laptop sleeve and plenty of pockets inside and out. Don't you feel calmer already?

This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste.

name: UCL Mini 23/24 Group Stage Ball
description: A pint-sized ball that'll make your soccer sing.As European club soccer's finest stand shoulder to shoulder, two words provide the inspiration as that famous anthem plays. This adidas UCL Mini Ball shows off graphics inspired by the UEFA Champions League official match ball. Spelling out "The Champions" and displaying subtle musical notes, those 12 stars shine from a hardwearing TPU cover. Its small size and foam core make this ball perfect for taking your skills on tour.
color: White / Silver Metallic / Bright Cyan / Shock Purple

name: Young BTS Creator Backpack
description:
A sporty school backpack made in part with recycled content.Your backpack is your constant companion. Why compromise on function or style? This adidas backpack has everything you need for long days, like comfortable padded straps and side pockets for carrying water bottles or energy drinks. It wipes clean with soap and water. Prominent adidas graphics give it a sporty look.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Young BTS Creator Backpack
description:
A sporty school backpack made in part with recycled content.Your backpack is your constant companion. Why compromise on function or style? This backpack has everything you need for long days, like comfortable padded straps and side pockets for carrying water bottles or energy drinks. It wipes clean with soap and water. Prominent adidas graphics give it a sporty look.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas x Classic LEGO® 0.75 L Steel Bottle
description: This sturdy steel bottle keeps water fresh and cool.A fun water bottle for LEGO® fans. This kids' adidas steel bottle is perfect for youngsters to carry with them day-to-day. It's BPA-free and has a screw-top lid that stays firmly in place.

name: Adicolor Backpack
description:
A spacious backpack with a classic design.When it comes to choosing the perfect bag for a busy day, space is key. Throw on this adidas backpack, and carry all your gear with ease. A roomy main compartment and front and side pockets let you keep your essentials organized and accessible. Plus, it's decked out in Trefoil logo style, so you can show off your adidas love on all your daily adventures.

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: Young BTS Creator Backpack
description:
A sporty school backpack made in part with recycled content.Your backpack is your constant companion. Why compromise on function or style? This adidas backpack has everything you need for long days, like comfortable padded straps and side pockets for carrying water bottles or energy drinks. It wipes clean with soap and water. Prominent adidas graphics give it a sporty look.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

color: Medium Grey / Semi Flash Green / Onix

name: Conext 24 Mini Ball
description: A scaled-down ball for showing your skills.Supersize your soccer skills with this pint-sized ball. Thanks to its diminutive dimensions and foam core, this adidas Conext 24 Mini ball is perfect for training on your travels. Set your keepie-uppie record by the pool and take your footwork to new heights on the beach. Then unleash your new-found skills on the pitch.

name: Youth Performance Hat
description:
A classic golf hat made with recycled materials.Hit the links, adidas style. This juniors' golf hat is made in a classic six-panel style. The pre-curved brim shades your eyes so you can focus on the ball. A snapback closure lets you adjust for the perfect fit. The bold logo on the front finishes the look.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Soccer Shin Guard Straps
description: Hook-and-loop straps to keep soccer shin guards in place.Help your soccer star keep their eye on the ball and their head in the game. These kids' shin guard straps from adidas wrap around guards to fix them firmly in place. Their flexible design and secure hook-and-loop closures ensure everything stays where it needs to be from kickoff to final whistle.

name: Classic 3-Stripes Backpack
description:
An everyday backpack with an easy-to-clean design.Your work-to-workout hero. This adidas backpack offers plenty of space for your gym clothes and workday essentials. An inner sleeve stores your laptop, and a zip pocket at the top lets you keep your most important items close. Heroes come in all shapes and sizes. 

This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste.

name: adidas x Classic LEGO® Beanie Kids
description: A warm knit beanie for little LEGO® fans.Keep that creative brain comfortable and primed to play. This kids' beanie is done up in bright colors and is part of the LEGO Group and adidas collection. It's knit from soft yarn and has a thick cuff for double the warmth over kids' ears. A LEGO® badge on the front inspires double the fun.

name: Fussballliebe Mini Ball
description: A scaled-down ball inspired by the big tournament in Germany.When you're honing your soccer skills, this adidas Fussballliebe mini ball is your perfect sidekick. Made for pinpoint play, its smooth TPU surface withstands powerful strikes and the foam core means there's no need for a pump. Emblazoned with a design inspired by the official match ball of Europe's biggest international tournament, this diminutive ball lets you celebrate the beautiful game wherever you go.

name: Youth Originals Trefoil Chain Snapback
description: A flat-brim cap with pure adidas style.Keep it classic in this snapback cap featuring a chain-stitched dimensional logo. Six-panel silhouette with a flat brim, stitched eyelets on the crown and an adjustable snapback strap and embroidered logo at the back.

name: MLS 24 Mini Ball
description: A pint-sized ball that marks a historic moment in US soccer history.Celebrate the 30th anniversary of the USA's most prestigious soccer event. This adidas Mini ball takes its design inspiration from the MLS official match ball. Displaying a colorful design scaled down to palm-sized perfection, it has a solid foam core so you'll never need to reach for a pump.

name: Graphic Backpack Kids
description:
A sleek graphic backpack made in part with recycled materials.Brighten up the day with this juniors' adidas backpack, inspired by the possibilities the future holds. The generous main compartment organizes books, folders and lunch, while a front zip pocket keeps tabs on snacks and smaller items. Adjustable straps personalize the fit. Stay comfortable with a foam back panel that adds cushioned softness all through the day. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Excel Lunch Bag
description:
An easy-to-clean insulated lunch bag, made in part with recycled materialsCrave something cold after a hard workout? Pack up this insulated adidas lunch bag and keep your protein shake or post-gym snacks cool. A separate mesh pocket inside even lets you slide in an ice pack. A clip on the top makes it easy to attach it to another bag, so you'll never leave it behind.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas x Classic LEGO® Waist Bag
description:
A LEGO®-themed waist bag made in part with recycled materials.Whether you're exploring the city or hanging out with friends, keep your valuables at hand in this juniors' adidas waist bag done up in vibrant, LEGO®-inspired colours. Wear it around the waist or as a crossbody bag for versatile carry. A front zip pocket and main compartment keep your things organised. The adjustable strap with a buckle closure clicks in a comfortable fit. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content.

name: adidas x LEGO® Tech Pack Neck Warmer
description:
A neck warmer with fun graphic details, made in part with recycled materials.Fun, functional clothes can encourage kids to play outdoors. Part of the LEGO® Brand and adidas partnership, this neck warmer is made from soft polyester fabric. They'll feel toasty and might even forget they have it on! 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 60% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Disney's Mickey Mouse Socks 3 Pairs Kids
description:
Soft socks featuring Disney's legendary characters.Adventures are even more fun when Mickey Mouse and the gang come along. Decorated with bright graphics, these kids' adidas socks bring the magic of Disney to every step. Comfortable cotton blend fabric means kids can explore all day in comfort while the versatile crew length teams easily with all their favorite outfits. 

The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

Find out more here: https://bettercotton.org/who-we-are/our-logo/
color: Off White / Preloved Ink S24 / Bright Red

name: 3-Stripes Rubber X3 Basketball
description: A durable indoor/outdoor basketball.Get in the game. Take this adidas basketball for a pickup game on the hardwood or the blacktop. The soft and durable rubber feels true with every bounce and catch of the ball, whether you're practicing on your own or playing with friends. 3-Stripes across the channels give it a distinct look.

name: adidas Originals x Mark Gonzales Waist Bag
description:
This waist bag for kids is made in part with recycled materials.Let little ones head out into their day with every essential they'll need. Designed in collaboration with skateboarding legend Mark Gonzales, this adidas waist bag adopts his signature Shmoofoil graphics for skate-inspired edge. An adjustable strap delivers a perfectly snug fit, and the zippered main compartment and inner pocket keep track of the little things they need through the day. 

This product is made with at least 50% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

name: 3-Stripes Rubber Mini Basketball
description: A durable indoor/outdoor mini basketball.Ball out anywhere. This adidas mini basketball can be used for a quick pickup game with a smaller hoop or as a nice collectible. The durable rubber lets you play on the hardwood or the blacktop. The gold 3-Bar design and 3-Stripes running across the channels give it a distinct look.

name: Tiro Match Shin Guards Kids
description:
High-coverage soccer shin guards made in part with recycled content.Commit to your game without worrying about your rivals. Built for young players on the rise, these juniors' adidas Tiro Match shin guards boost your coverage with EVA-backed hard shields and padded ankle guards. A hook-and-loop closure keeps everything in place so you can focus on getting the win.

Made with at least 20% recycled content to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

name: Disney's Mickey Mouse Backpack
description:
A lightweight Disney backpack made in part with recycled materials.From the classroom to the playground and everywhere in between, this kids' adidas backpack keeps kids well prepared. Inside, there's room for all their daily essentials. And when kids are on the move, the combination of padded straps and a chest strap help them balance the load. Featuring Disney favorite Mickey Mouse, this backpack sparks imagination and adventure. 

This product is made with at least 50% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.
color: Off White / Preloved Ink S24 / Bright Red

name: Squad Backpack
description:
A sleek backpack made for jam-packed days.School to practice to evening study session. This adidas backpack lets you easily pack up for busy days with a roomy main compartment, multiple zip pockets and space for your water bottle. A removable case helps keep track of your pens and pencils. 

This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste.

name: Par Three Novelty Hat
description:
A golf hat that fits close to the head.Aim for the green in this juniors' adidas golf hat. All-cotton twill delivers lightweight comfort and breathability on the course. The five-panel design has a shallow crown for a close fit. 

A minimum of 50% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Santiago 2 Lunch Bag
description:
An insulated lunch bag made in part with recycled content.Healthy eating just got easier. This adidas insulated lunch bag keeps fresh food and drinks cold. An expandable back pocket holds grab-and-go protein bars and other snacks. A convenient clip lock allows you to attach the bag to your backpack or other larger carry bag. The 3-Stripes give the bag a legacy look.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

name: Tiro Match Shin Guards Kids
description:
High-coverage soccer shin guards made in part with recycled content.Commit to your game without worrying about your rivals. Built for young players on the rise, these juniors' adidas Tiro Match shin guards boost your coverage with EVA-backed hard shields and padded ankle guards. A hook-and-loop closure keeps everything in place so you can focus on getting the win.

Made with at least 20% recycled content to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
color: Lucid Lemon F23 / Black / Lucid Lemon F23

name: Brand Love Hat Kids
description:
A casual hat made in part with recycled materials.They're called classics for a reason. This juniors' adidas baseball cap brings timeless style into your daily looks. The vintage graphic calls to adidas' storied heritage. A padded inner sweatband keeps moisture away. The Badge of Sport adds the final touch.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: Arctic Night F23 / Pink Fusion F23

name: 5-Inch Volleyball Kneepads
description: Low-profile kneepads for confidence on court.Never be afraid to play your shots. These juniors' adidas volleyball kneepads include foam padding that absorbs impacts every time you hit the deck. Soft and stretchy, the low-profile sleeve holds everything in place so you can spend more time plotting your next move and less time thinking about the floor.

name: Sock Guard
description: Removable guards protecting fancy footwork.Dominate the soccer field in these protective sock guards for juniors. A tough front shield defends your shins from impacts while the sock's engineered fit holds it firmly in place. The shields can be removed for easy washing.

name: Collegiate Bucket Hat Kids
description:
A juniors' bucket hat made in part with recycled materials.Top off your look with collegiate-inspired style. This juniors' adidas bucket hat is a must-have for mall weekends and morning coffee runs. The pure cotton twill fabric is durable but comfortable too, and the all-around brim keeps the silhouette classic. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Disney's Mickey Mouse Cap Kids
description:
A soft Disney cap made in part with recycled materials.This Mickey Mouse cap brings Disney magic to the playground. Whether zooming down the slide or conquering the monkey bars, kids stay comfortable in this kids' adidas baseball cap. The snap-back design is easy to adjust while the pre-curved brim provides plenty of shade. 

This product is made with at least 50% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

name: Graphic Bucket Hat Kids
description:
A juniors' bucket hat made in part with recycled materials.One part skate style and one part futuristic vibes, this juniors' adidas bucket hat is all you. With graphic elements inspired by the metaverse, it shows up with optimism and an adventurous spirit. Pure cotton twill is durable and comfortable, and the all-around brim gives you that classic shape. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas x LEGO® Beanie
description: An adidas x LEGO® beanie for creative minds and active bodies.Blocks. Couch cushions. Driftwood on the beach. Whatever's available, kids' zeal for building things stems straight from their noggins. This adidas x LEGO® beanie shows off that spark, celebrating the power of sport and creativity to engage kids in their world. It feels light and a bit silky to the touch.

name: Brand Love Crew Socks 3 Pairs
description:
Three pairs of casual socks to add to your expression.With good socks, the mood is always right. Embrace originality with these juniors' adidas socks. Graphic artwork combines a hand-drawn aesthetic with an energetic spirit. The soft cotton blend brings comfort that's perfect for lounging at home or hanging with friends. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.  

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore
color: Collegiate Green / Black / Arctic Night F23

name: Cushioned Angle Stripe Quarter Socks 6 Pairs
description: Quarter-length socks with a soft, stretchy feel.Made for active kids, these comfortable socks wick away sweat to help their feet stay dry. A breathable mesh upper adds ventilation to help cut down on moisture and odor. Extra cushioning at the heel and toe makes sure things stay comfortable, too. From the classroom to the field, these socks are ready for a long day's ride.

name: Team Issue Fold Beanie
description: A warm beanie made for winter fun.Your little one is all suited up for a day of winter play in this kids' adidas beanie. Soft acrylic yarn holds in heat while they fly down the slope on a tube or build a snow fort. An adidas Badge of Sport logo is embroidered on the fold-up cuff for a sporty touch.

name: Cushioned Angle Stripe Low-Cut Socks 6 Pairs
description: Great everyday socks for school and play.With lots of cushioning in the heel and toe and a soft, stretchy feel, these kids' socks are big on comfort. Whether they're bouncing around between classes, practice or after-school activities, their feet will stay dry thanks to moisture-absorbing yarn and a mesh upper. The 3-Stripes design gives the socks a classic adidas feel.

name: Excel Lunch Bag
description:
An easy-to-clean insulated lunch bag, made in part with recycled materials.Crave something cold after a hard workout? Pack up this insulated adidas lunch bag, and keep your protein shake or post-gym snacks cool. A separate mesh pocket inside lets you slide in an ice pack to keep food extra-cold. A clip on the top makes it easy to attach it to another bag, so you'll never leave it behind.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 40% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Tiro Match Shin Guards
description:
Hard shields with ankle guards, made in part with recycled content.Bolster your defenses on the soccer field with a name you can trust. These juniors' adidas Match shin guards have you covered with EVA-backed hard shields and attached ankle guards. They might not be as low-profile as other pads in the Tiro range, but they'll keep you confident as you glide through slides and lunges on your way to goal.

Made with at least 20% recycled content to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

name: Anti-Slip Socks 2 Pairs Kids
description:
Classic adidas socks made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Free spirits may not stick to the path or color within the lines, but with these kids' adidas anti-slip socks, they'll stay steady on their feet. Kids can blaze their own trails thanks to Trefoils on the bottoms that add style and security. Off they go!

A minimum of 50% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.
